S

sendFileToClient() - Method in class FileServer
Uses the filename gotten from getFileNameFromClient() method, and creates a file input stream which recieves bytes of data from the file, then writes those bytes to the outputStream (inputStream) of the client
serverConnection - Variable in class FileRetrieverClient
The client socket used for the file transfer
serverSocket - Variable in class FileServer
The Server Socket that waits for the client to connect to
start() - Method in class FileRetrieverClient
Creates a socket to connect the specified port of the specified IP address, input and output steams to communicate with the server, and a file stream to output the file contents into from the server.
start() - Method in class FileServer
Creates the Server Socket that the client needs to connect to, retrieves a filename which is sent through the connection of the socket via the output stream
